thread.title_full: LEGO Romantic Valentine Picnic Set Only $9.99 (Best Price)

author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: LEGO Romantic Valentine Picnic Set Only $9.99 (Best Price)
text:
Hop on over to Lego.com where you can snag this season’s LEGO Romantic Valentine Picnic set for only $9.99! Shipping is $4.95 or is free on orders of $35 or more. Seems like a great deal seeing as Amazon has this priced at $22.99.

This set includes 2 minifigures, and features buildable sandwiches, picnic blanket, red balloon, bouquet of flowers and more!
(Thanks, ET!)
